title: Savoring a Premium Business Lunch in Marunouchi
description: Discover the best restaurants in Tokyo Station's Marunouchi area, perfect for your business lunch. From luxury hotel dining to specialty tonkatsu, we've carefully selected establishments where you can enjoy a high-quality lunch experience.
content:
# Savoring a Premium Business Lunch in Marunouchi

Marunouchi, adjacent to Tokyo Station, is one of Japan's premier business districts. Lined with high-rise office buildings and luxury hotels, this area is home to numerous high-quality restaurants perfect for business lunches. Whether it's for an important business meeting or a well-deserved treat for yourself, we introduce some of Marunouchi's finest dining spots for lunch.

## Edomae Sushi at Palace Hotel

<Place id="ChIJ7VMKEAiMGGARwI1hrc3Fo_0" />
Located within the Palace Hotel Tokyo, this is a renowned restaurant for authentic Edomae sushi. Enjoy sushi crafted by skilled chefs in a prime location overlooking the Imperial Palace. The lunch Omakase course features the day's recommended toppings, carefully selected to highlight seasonal ingredients. Despite its hotel setting, the restaurant offers a welcoming, casual atmosphere. It's an ideal choice for both business lunches and client entertainment, making it one of Marunouchi's most representative sushi establishments.

## Renowned Chinese Cuisine

<Place id="ChIJdX2LBQiMGGAR1NXXf0LrKQA" />
This renowned restaurant in Marunouchi offers authentic Chinese cuisine. They provide a wide range of regional dishes, including Sichuan, Cantonese, and Shanghai styles, with an extensive lunch menu. The luxurious interior creates a calm atmosphere suitable for both business lunches and entertaining clients. Another great feature is the ability to choose from light options like dim sum and noodles to more substantial course meals. Highly recommended when you're looking for authentic Chinese in Marunouchi.

## Specialty Tonkatsu

<Place id="ChIJN4zgs_mLGGAR-nbmNBpjOsY" />
Located within the Shin-Marunouchi Building, this is a renowned tonkatsu restaurant. They use carefully selected pork to deliver a delicious dish with a crispy coating and juicy meat. During lunchtime, it's served in a set meal style, with complimentary refills of rice, miso soup, and cabbage. Despite its prime location in a business district, you can enjoy high-quality tonkatsu at a reasonable price. With quick service, it's highly recommended for business professionals seeking a satisfying meal within a limited timeframe.

## Enjoy a Fulfilling Lunch in Marunouchi

Whether it's for an important negotiation or a well-deserved personal treat, why not indulge in a premium lunch experience unique to Marunouchi?
